structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 77, effective January 1, 2006. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 25, effective June 16, 1960. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 16. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4023.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Liability for tax as between holders of various interests in property.
